goals.active: Make contact with the Vigil in Lion's Arch.
goals.complete: I received a letter from Warmaster Forgal, a member of the Vigil. I'm to meet with him and the general at Fort Marriner.

goals.active: Go to Fort Marriner outside Lion's Arch.
goals.complete: General Almorra has asked me to assist Warmaster Forgal on a mission to Ascalon, where the treaty at Ebonhawke is in jeopardy from renegades. The Vigil wants the peace to succeed.

goals.active: Travel to the fortress of Ebonhawke and assist Warmaster Forgal.
goals.complete: I assisted Warmaster Forgal and saved Ebonhawke from invading charr renegades.
